title: BMCR10
description: Actual temperature is lower than set low band limit. (Low Band limit = Set temperature - Low band)
reasons_remedies: The temperature of the bottom heating plate is low (15 0C less than the set temperature).
Check the temperature set for the bottom heating plate.
Check the band value set for the bottom heating plate.
Check the temperature sensor of the bottom heating plate.
Parameters re OK but temperature not risnig.
Check if themocouple is connected to bottom heater plate properly.
Check if the SSR is switching on.
Check the heater connection and check voltage during on condition at SSR output and Junction Box.
Check if the deafult PID parameters are shown on machine as per below image.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMCR10
Error Code 10
Category: BMCR
Title: BMCR10
Alarm Message: Forming Bottom Low Temperature
Description: Actual temperature is lower than set low band limit. (Low Band limit = Set temperature - Low band)
Reason & Remedy:
1. The temperature of the bottom heating plate is low (15 0C less than the set temperature).
2. Check the temperature set for the bottom heating plate.
3. Check the band value set for the bottom heating plate.
4. Check the temperature sensor of the bottom heating plate.
5. Parameters re OK but temperature not risnig.
6. Check if themocouple is connected to bottom heater plate properly.
7. Check if the SSR is switching on.
8. Check if Contactor is on.
9. Check the heater connection and check voltage during on condition at SSR output and Junction Box.
10. Check heater resistance.
11. PID parameters.
12. Check if the deafult PID parameters are shown on machine as per below image.
Visual References:
- Sealing screen
